rukus.text: Atahpara pheresatagana yakhana luta paribarera kache asala
takhana luta balalena, ‘tomara to aparicita loka’
Tara balala, ‘na, tara ye bisaye sandigdha chila amara apanara kache ta’i niye esechi
ara amara apanara kache satya sambada niye esechi ebam abasya'i amara satyabadi

kaje'i apani ratera kono eka samaye apanara paribarabargake niye beriye paruna ebam apani tadera pichane caluna [1]. Ara tomadera madhye ke'u yena pichane na takaya [2]; tomaderake yekhane yete bala hayeche tomara sekhane cale ya'o [3].’
Ara amara take e bisaye phayasala janiye dilama ye, niscaya taderake bhore samule binasa kara habe
Ara nagarabasi ullasita haye upasthita hala
Tini balalena, niscaya era amara atithi; kaje'i tomara amake be'iyayata karo na
Ara tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amake heya karo na.’
Tara balala, amara ki duniyasud'dha lokake asraya dite tomake nisedha karini
luta balalena, ekanta'i yadi tomara kichu karate ca'o tabe amara e kan'yara rayeche
Apanara jibana [1], niscaya tara tadera nesaya bibhranta haye ghurachila
Atahpara suryodayera samaya prakanda citkara taderake pakara'o karala
tate amara janapadake ultiye upara-nica kare dilama ebam tadera upara poramatira pathara-kankara barsana karalama
Niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche paryabeksana-saktisampanna byaktidera jan'ya
Ara niscaya ta loka calacalera pathera pase'i bidyamana
Niscaya ete muminadera jan'ya rayeche nidarsana
atahpara amara tadera theke pratisodha nilama, ara e janapada du’ti'i prakasya pathera pase abasthita
